001package squidpony.squidgrid.mapping;
002
003import java.awt.Point;
004import java.util.Arrays;
005import java.util.Collections;
006import java.util.Deque;
007import java.util.LinkedList;
008import java.util.List;
009import squidpony.squidgrid.Direction;
010import squidpony.squidmath.RNG;
011
012/**
013 * Creates a dungeon in the style of the original Rogue game. It will always
014 * make a grid style of rooms where there are a certain number horizontally and
015 * vertically and it will link them only next to each other.
016 *
017 * This dungeon generator is based on a port of the rot.js version.
018 *
019 * @author hyakugei
020 * @author Eben Howard - http://squidpony.com - howard@squidpony.com
021 */
022public class ClassicRogueMapGenerator {
023
024    /**
025     * Holds the information needed to track rooms in the classic rogue
026     * generation algorithm.
027     */
028    private class ClassicRogueRoom {
029
030        private int x, y, width, height, cellx, celly;
031        private final List<ClassicRogueRoom> connections = new LinkedList<>();
032
033        ClassicRogueRoom(int x, int y, int width, int height, int cellx, int celly) {
034            this.x = x;
035            this.y = y;
036            this.width = width;
037            this.height = height;
038            this.cellx = cellx;
039            this.celly = celly;
040        }
041
042        @Override
043        public int hashCode() {
044            int hash = 5;
045            hash = 89 * hash + this.cellx;
046            hash = 89 * hash + this.celly;
047            return hash;
048        }
049
050        @Override
051        public boolean equals(Object obj) {
052            if (obj == null) {
053                return false;
054            }
055            if (getClass() != obj.getClass()) {
056                return false;
057            }
058            final ClassicRogueRoom other = (ClassicRogueRoom) obj;
059            if (this.cellx != other.cellx) {
060                return false;
061            }
062            if (this.celly != other.celly) {
063                return false;
064            }
065            return true;
066        }
067    }
068
069    private static final RNG rng = new RNG();
070
071    private int horizontalRooms, verticalRooms, dungeonWidth, dungeonHeight,
072            minRoomWidth, maxRoomWidth, minRoomHeight, maxRoomHeight;
073    private ClassicRogueRoom[][] rooms;
074    private Terrain[][] map;
075
076    /**
077     * Initializes the generator to turn out random dungeons within the specific
078     * parameters.
079     *
080     * Will size down the room width and height parameters if needed to ensure
081     * the desired number of rooms will fit both horizontally and vertically.
082     *
083     * @param horizontalRooms How many rooms will be made horizontally
084     * @param verticalRooms How many rooms will be made vertically
085     * @param dungeonWidth How wide the total dungeon will be
086     * @param dungeonHeight How high the total dungeon will be
087     * @param minRoomWidth The minimum width a room can be
088     * @param maxRoomWidth The maximum width a room can be
089     * @param minRoomHeight The minimum height a room can be
090     * @param maxRoomHeight The maximum height a room can be
091     */
092    public ClassicRogueMapGenerator(int horizontalRooms, int verticalRooms, int dungeonWidth, int dungeonHeight, int minRoomWidth, int maxRoomWidth, int minRoomHeight, int maxRoomHeight) {
093        this.horizontalRooms = horizontalRooms;
094        this.verticalRooms = verticalRooms;
095        this.dungeonWidth = dungeonWidth;
096        this.dungeonHeight = dungeonHeight;
097        this.minRoomWidth = minRoomWidth;
098        this.maxRoomWidth = maxRoomWidth;
099        this.minRoomHeight = minRoomHeight;
100        this.maxRoomHeight = maxRoomHeight;
101
102        sanitizeRoomDimensions();
103    }
104
105    private void sanitizeRoomDimensions() {
106        int test = (dungeonWidth - 3 * horizontalRooms) / horizontalRooms;//have to leave space for hallways
107        maxRoomWidth = Math.min(test, maxRoomWidth);
108        minRoomWidth = Math.max(minRoomWidth, 2);
109        minRoomWidth = Math.min(minRoomWidth, maxRoomWidth);
110
111        test = (dungeonHeight - 3 * verticalRooms) / (verticalRooms);//have to leave space for hallways
112        maxRoomHeight = Math.min(test, maxRoomHeight);
113        minRoomHeight = Math.max(minRoomHeight, 2);
114        minRoomHeight = Math.min(minRoomHeight, maxRoomHeight);
115    }
116
117    /**
118     * Builds and returns a map in the Classic Rogue style.
119     *
120     * Only includes rooms, corridors and doors.
121     *
122     * @return
123     */
124    public Terrain[][] create() {
125        initRooms();
126        connectRooms();
127        connectUnconnectedRooms();
128        fullyConnect();
129        createRooms();
130        createCorridors();
131        return map;
132    }
133
134    private void initRooms() {
135        rooms = new ClassicRogueRoom[horizontalRooms][verticalRooms];
136        map = new Terrain[dungeonWidth][dungeonHeight];
137        for (int x = 0; x < horizontalRooms; x++) {
138            for (int y = 0; y < verticalRooms; y++) {
139                rooms[x][y] = new ClassicRogueRoom(0, 0, 0, 0, x, y);
140            }
141        }
142        for (int x = 0; x < dungeonWidth; x++) {
143            for (int y = 0; y < dungeonHeight; y++) {
144                map[x][y] = Terrain.WALL;
145            }
146        }
147    }
148
149    private void connectRooms() {
150        List<ClassicRogueRoom> unconnected = new LinkedList<>();
151        for (int x = 0; x < horizontalRooms; x++) {
152            for (int y = 0; y < verticalRooms; y++) {
153                unconnected.add(rooms[x][y]);
154            }
155        }
156        Collections.shuffle(unconnected, rng.asRandom());
157
158        List<Direction> dirToCheck;
159        for (ClassicRogueRoom room : unconnected) {
160            dirToCheck = Arrays.asList(Direction.CARDINALS);
161            Collections.shuffle(dirToCheck, rng.asRandom());
162            for (Direction dir : dirToCheck) {
163                int nextX = room.x + dir.deltaX;
164                int nextY = room.y + dir.deltaY;
165                if (nextX < 0 || nextX >= horizontalRooms || nextY < 0 || nextY >= verticalRooms) {
166                    continue;
167                }
168                ClassicRogueRoom otherRoom = rooms[nextX][nextY];
169
170                if (room.connections.contains(otherRoom)) {
171                    break;//already connected to this room
172                }
173
174                if (!otherRoom.connections.isEmpty()) {
175                    room.connections.add(otherRoom);
176                    break;
177                }
178            }
179        }
180    }
181
182    private void connectUnconnectedRooms() {
183        for (int x = 0; x < horizontalRooms; x++) {
184            for (int y = 0; y < verticalRooms; y++) {
185                ClassicRogueRoom room = rooms[x][y];
186
187                if (room.connections.isEmpty()) {
188                    List<Direction> dirToCheck = new LinkedList<>();
189                    dirToCheck.addAll(Arrays.asList(Direction.CARDINALS));
190                    Collections.shuffle(dirToCheck, rng.asRandom());
191
192                    boolean validRoom = false;
193                    ClassicRogueRoom otherRoom = null;
194
195                    do {
196                        Direction dir = dirToCheck.remove(0);
197
198                        int nextX = x + dir.deltaX;
199                        if (nextX < 0 || nextX >= horizontalRooms) {
200                            continue;
201                        }
202                        int nextY = y + dir.deltaY;
203                        if (nextY < 0 || nextY >= verticalRooms) {
204                            continue;
205                        }
206
207                        otherRoom = rooms[nextX][nextY];
208                        validRoom = true;
209
210                        if (otherRoom.connections.contains(room)) {
211                            validRoom = false;
212                            continue;
213                        }
214
215                        if (validRoom) {
216                            break;
217                        }
218
219                    } while (!dirToCheck.isEmpty());
220
221                    if (validRoom) {
222                        room.connections.add(otherRoom);
223                    }
224                }
225            }
226        }
227    }
228
229    private void fullyConnect() {
230        boolean allGood;
231        do {
232            Deque<ClassicRogueRoom> deq = new LinkedList<>();
233            for (int x = 0; x < horizontalRooms; x++) {
234                for (int y = 0; y < verticalRooms; y++) {
235                    deq.offer(rooms[x][y]);
236                }
237            }
238            Deque<ClassicRogueRoom> connected = new LinkedList<>();
239            connected.add(deq.pop());
240            boolean changed = true;
241            testing:
242            while (changed) {
243                changed = false;
244                for (ClassicRogueRoom test : deq) {
245                    for (ClassicRogueRoom r : connected) {
246                        if (test.connections.contains(r) || r.connections.contains(test)) {
247                            connected.offer(test);
248                            deq.remove(test);
249                            changed = true;
250                            continue testing;
251                        }
252                    }
253                }
254            }
255
256            allGood = true;
257            if (!deq.isEmpty()) {
258                testing:
259                for (ClassicRogueRoom room : deq) {
260                    for (Direction dir : Direction.CARDINALS) {
261                        int x = room.cellx + dir.deltaX;
262                        int y = room.celly + dir.deltaY;
263                        if (x >= 0 && y >= 0 && x < horizontalRooms && y < verticalRooms) {
264                            ClassicRogueRoom otherRoom = rooms[x][y];
265                            if (connected.contains(otherRoom)) {
266                                room.connections.add(otherRoom);
267                                allGood = false;
268                                break testing;
269                            }
270                        }
271                    }
272                }
273            }
274
275        } while (!allGood);
276    }
277
278    private void createRooms() {
279        int cwp = dungeonWidth / horizontalRooms;
280        int chp = dungeonHeight / verticalRooms;
281
282        ClassicRogueRoom otherRoom;
283
284        for (int x = 0; x < horizontalRooms; x++) {
285            for (int y = 0; y < verticalRooms; y++) {
286                int sx = cwp * x;
287                int sy = chp * y;
288
289                sx = Math.max(sx, 2);
290                sy = Math.max(sy, 2);
291
292                int roomw = rng.between(minRoomWidth, maxRoomWidth + 1);
293                int roomh = rng.between(minRoomHeight, maxRoomHeight + 1);
294
295                if (y > 0) {
296                    otherRoom = rooms[x][y - 1];
297                    while (sy - (otherRoom.y + otherRoom.height) < 3) {
298                        sy++;
299                    }
300                }
301
302                if (x > 0) {
303                    otherRoom = rooms[x - 1][y];
304                    while (sx - (otherRoom.x + otherRoom.width) < 3) {
305                        sx++;
306                    }
307                }
308
309                int sxOffset = Math.round(rng.nextInt(cwp - roomw) / 2);
310                int syOffset = Math.round(rng.nextInt(chp - roomh) / 2);
311
312                while (sx + sxOffset + roomw >= dungeonWidth) {
313                    if (sxOffset > 0) {
314                        sxOffset--;
315                    } else {
316                        roomw--;
317                    }
318                }
319                while (sy + syOffset + roomh >= dungeonHeight) {
320                    if (syOffset > 0) {
321                        syOffset--;
322                    } else {
323                        roomh--;
324                    }
325                }
326
327                sx += sxOffset;
328                sy += syOffset;
329
330                ClassicRogueRoom r = rooms[x][y];
331                r.x = sx;
332                r.y = sy;
333                r.width = roomw;
334                r.height = roomh;
335
336                for (int xx = sx; xx < sx + roomw; xx++) {
337                    for (int yy = sy; yy < sy + roomh; yy++) {
338                        map[xx][yy] = Terrain.FLOOR;
339                    }
340                }
341            }
342        }
343    }
344
345    private Point randomWallPosition(ClassicRogueRoom room, Direction dir) {
346        int x, y;
347        Point p = null;
348
349        switch (dir) {
350            case LEFT:
351                y = rng.between(room.y + 1, room.y + room.height);
352                x = room.x - 1;
353                map[x][y] = Terrain.CLOSED_DOOR;
354                p = new Point(x - 1, y);
355                break;
356            case RIGHT:
357                y = rng.between(room.y + 1, room.y + room.height);
358                x = room.x + room.width;
359                map[x][y] = Terrain.CLOSED_DOOR;
360                p = new Point(x + 1, y);
361                break;
362            case UP:
363                x = rng.between(room.x + 1, room.x + room.width);
364                y = room.y - 1;
365                map[x][y] = Terrain.CLOSED_DOOR;
366                p = new Point(x, y - 1);
367                break;
368            case DOWN:
369                x = rng.between(room.x + 1, room.x + room.width);
370                y = room.y + room.height;
371                map[x][y] = Terrain.CLOSED_DOOR;
372                p = new Point(x, y + 1);
373                break;
374        }
375
376        return p;
377    }
378
379    /**
380     * Draws a corridor between the two points with a zig-zag in between.
381     *
382     * @param start
383     * @param end
384     */
385    private void digPath(Point start, Point end) {
386        int xOffset = end.x - start.x;
387        int yOffset = end.y - start.y;
388        int xpos = start.x;
389        int ypos = start.y;
390
391        List<Magnitude> moves = new LinkedList<>();
392
393        int xAbs = Math.abs(xOffset);
394        int yAbs = Math.abs(yOffset);
395
396        double firstHalf = rng.nextDouble();
397        double secondHalf = 1 - firstHalf;
398
399        Direction xDir = xOffset < 0 ? Direction.LEFT : Direction.RIGHT;
400        Direction yDir = yOffset > 0 ? Direction.DOWN : Direction.UP;
401
402        if (xAbs < yAbs) {
403            int tempDist = (int) Math.ceil(yAbs * firstHalf);
404            moves.add(new Magnitude(yDir, tempDist));
405            moves.add(new Magnitude(xDir, xAbs));
406            tempDist = (int) Math.floor(yAbs * secondHalf);
407            moves.add(new Magnitude(yDir, tempDist));
408        } else {
409            int tempDist = (int) Math.ceil(xAbs * firstHalf);
410            moves.add(new Magnitude(xDir, tempDist));
411            moves.add(new Magnitude(yDir, yAbs));
412            tempDist = (int) Math.floor(xAbs * secondHalf);
413            moves.add(new Magnitude(xDir, tempDist));
414        }
415
416        map[xpos][ypos] = Terrain.FLOOR;
417
418        while (!moves.isEmpty()) {
419            Magnitude move = moves.remove(0);
420            Direction dir = move.dir;
421            int dist = move.distance;
422            while (dist > 0) {
423                xpos += dir.deltaX;
424                ypos += dir.deltaY;
425                map[xpos][ypos] = Terrain.FLOOR;
426                dist--;
427            }
428        }
429    }
430
431    private void createCorridors() {
432        for (int x = 0; x < horizontalRooms; x++) {
433            for (int y = 0; y < verticalRooms; y++) {
434                ClassicRogueRoom room = rooms[x][y];
435                for (ClassicRogueRoom otherRoom : room.connections) {
436                    Direction dir = Direction.getCardinalDirection(otherRoom.cellx - room.cellx, otherRoom.celly - room.celly);
437                    digPath(randomWallPosition(room, dir), randomWallPosition(otherRoom, dir.opposite()));
438                }
439            }
440        }
441    }
442
443    private class Magnitude {
444
445        public Direction dir;
446        public int distance;
447
448        public Magnitude(Direction dir, int distance) {
449            this.dir = dir;
450            this.distance = distance;
451        }
452    }
453}
